SELECT ac.COURSE_ID AS courseId, ac.COURSE_NAME AS courseName, ac.CREATE_TIME AS createTime, ac.UPDATE_TIME AS updateTime, ac.USER_ID AS userId, ac.`WEEK` AS `week`, ac.START_TIME AS startTime, ac.END_TIME AS endTime, ac.SIGNED_TIME AS signedTime, ac.LOCATION AS location, ac.LOCATION_NAME AS locationName, ac.SCOPE AS scope, ac.IMAGES AS images, ac.COURSE_JOB_ID AS courseJobId, ac.STUDENT_JOB_ID AS studentJobId FROM APP_COURSE ac WHERE ac.COURSE_NAME = #{courseName}
AND ac.COURSE_ID != #{courseId}

SELECT ac.COURSE_ID AS courseId, ac.COURSE_NAME AS courseName, ac.USER_ID AS userId, su.FULL_NAME AS fullName, ac.`WEEK` AS `week`, ac.START_TIME AS startTime, ac.END_TIME AS endTime, ac.SIGNED_TIME AS signedTime, ac.LOCATION AS location, ac.LOCATION_NAME AS locationName, ac.SCOPE AS scope, ac.IMAGES AS images, CASE WHEN `week` LIKE '%${week}%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isToday FROM APP_COURSE ac, SYS_USER su WHERE su.USER_ID = ac.USER_ID AND ac.COURSE_ID = #{courseId}

SELECT ac.COURSE_ID AS courseId, ac.COURSE_NAME AS courseName, ac.USER_ID AS userId, su.FULL_NAME AS fullName, ac.`WEEK` AS `week`, ac.START_TIME AS startTime, ac.END_TIME AS endTime, ac.SIGNED_TIME AS signedTime, ac.LOCATION AS location, ac.LOCATION_NAME AS locationName, ac.SCOPE AS scope, ac.IMAGES AS images, CASE WHEN `week` LIKE '%${week}%' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isToday, 1 AS entryStatus FROM APP_COURSE ac, SYS_USER su , APP_COURSE_STUDENT acs WHERE su.USER_ID = ac.USER_ID and acs.COURSE_ID = ac.COURSE_ID AND acs.USER_ID = #{userId}
